https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Advitya is an upcoming Indian Assameae language superhero film written and directed by Arindam Sharma. The film is produced by Brojendra Nath Sarma under Krrishna Kraft Productions (India) Pvt. Ltd. Advitya
